item.title: Football Manager
item.description: Taking inspiration from Football Management to guide reflection on my own performance, potential, impact and development as an Engineering Manager. Escape industry bias and questioning things anew. Both challenging environments with high expectations. Success relies on developing high performing teams. Here are areas I choose to reflect on: Current Performance Team Performance Assess the overall performance of your team in recent matches. Reflect on key victories, draws, and losses, and identify patterns or trends.
